DOC.brief_summary: To compare patient perception sensory attribute , include taste aftertaste , Olopatadine relative azelastine administer single dose patient allergic rhinitis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Sensory Attributes Olopatadine 0.6 % Azelastine 137mcg Nasal Sprays Patients w/Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Must history ( least 2 yr ) allergic rhinitis symptomatic time enrollment 2 . 18 yrs age old 3 . Read sign inform consent 4 . Females childbearing potential may participate : nonbreast feeding , negative urine pregnancy test visit 1 , agree take urine pregnancy test upon exit study , intend become pregnant study , use adequate method birth control . 1 . History intolerance hypersensitivity component study medication , include benzalkonium chloride . 2 . Any disease systemic disorder may complicate interfere investigation evaluation study medication ( include limit ) : Rhinitis medicamentosa , large obstructive nasal polyp , history ( w/in last 3 month ) nasal septic ulcer , nasal surgery nasal trauma , history evidence nasolacrimal drainage system malfunction , history ( w/in 30 day ) evidence sinusitis upper low respiratory infection . 3 . Impairment sense tast smell ( self report ) 4 . Asthma , except mild , intermittent asthma ( nat ' l Asthma guideline ) 5 . Congestion , opinion investigator , would interfere successful nasal drug administration/absorption 6 . Patients w/a severe impairment nasal breathe 7 . Anatomic abnormality identify nasal examination 8 . History current severe uncontrolled cardiovascular , hepatic , renal and/or disease/illness could interfere w/study . 9 . History ( w/in past 12 month ) ongoing clinically relevant electrolyte abnormality .
